name: Bricks vs Fruits
description:
Epic bricks vs fruits battles await you in this new ZX Spectrum 48K game. Will the fruits be able to bomb the wall and get to its foundations? Quick plums, heavy melons and sour lemons, all this and much more awaits our brick defenders.

The game features breathtaking multicolor graphics based on the ingenious Nirvana+ engine by Einar Saukas. Loving music by Roald Strauss will also be heard on machines equipped with the AY chip. And even the game loader itself is a small work of art.
